Key Arguments: The government and media have previously spread misinformation and disinformation, particularly during the Covid period, which harmed many lives.
The proposed legislation would give excessive control to a few individuals, which could lead to further misuse of power.
The concept of government-approved speech is fundamentally objectionable.
Notable Quotes: The mis/dis information from the government and media destroyed many lives over the Covid period.
This much control should not be in the hands of the few, especially considering the proposed consequences.
The idea of government approved speech is a hideous concept to be even considering.
